original_text: You know that a man is much more valuable than a sheep. So it is right for us to do good things on our day of rest.’
korean_text: 사람이 양보다 얼마나 더 귀하냐 그러므로 안식일에 선을 행하는 것이 옳으니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: a man is much more valuable than a sheep
So it is right for us
to do good things on our day of rest
